bibl.title: Scientific Analysis of a Fayum Portrait by the Getty Conservation Institute.
bibl.note: Private collection. - Results. - Pigment and Binder Analysis. - Radiocarbon Dating. - Conclusion. "The portrait was painted during the last part of the nineteenth century or the beginning of the twentieth century."

bibl.title: Portraits and Masks. Burial Customs in Roman Egypt

bibl.seg: CORZO M.A., D. STULIK, E. DOEHNE and A. WALLERT, Scientific Analysis of a Fayum Portrait by the Getty Conservation Institute.
Morris L. BIERBRIER (Ed.), Portraits and Masks. Burial Customs in Roman Egypt (London, 1997) pp. 81-87, 6 figg. et pl. 10.

Private collection. - Results. - Pigment and Binder Analysis. - Radiocarbon Dating. - Conclusion. "The portrait was painted during the last part of the nineteenth century or the beginning of the twentieth century."
